document.full_text: splittorff was a royals lifer who not only spent his entire 15-year pitching career in kansas city but who also became a color commentator and play-by-play announcer for the club.
document.title: paul splittorff, royals' biggest winner, dies at 64
lines_and_colors: splittorff was a royals lifer who not only spent his entire 15-year pitching career in kansas city but who also became a color commentator and play-by-play announcer for the club.
